divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS SITTING IN MY CAR IN A PARKING LOT DOWN THE ROAD FROM MY HOUSE AND I HAPPEN TO BE LOOKING OUT OF MY DRIVER SIDE WINDOW UP IN THE SKY. I THOUGHT WHAT SEEMED TO BE A SHOOTING STAR WHEN ALL OF A SUDDEN, IT STOPPED AND REVERSED ITSELF. IT DID THIS NUMEROUS TIMES REALLY FAST, THEN DISAPPEARED. I WAS SHOCKED! I HAVE SEEN PROFESSIONAL VIDEOS WITH THIS TYPE OF BEHAVIOR FROM UFOS AND I AM 100% THIS WAS A UFO!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Coward
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Medium size circle or star shape. Bright whitish blue.
